languages.text: "Жаль твою дочь, но если ты меня не пропустишь — уже завтра погибнет полсотни даргонуских сирот!"

traits.locale_text: "Жаль твою дочь, но если ты меня не пропустишь — уже завтра погибнет полсотни даргонуских сирот!"

languages.text: "I am sorry about your daughter, but if you do not let me past, tomorrow fifty Dargonian orphans will die!"
languages.original_text: "Жаль твою дочь, но если ты меня не пропустишь — уже завтра погибнет полсотни даргонуских сирот!"

traits.locale_text: "I am sorry about your daughter, but if you do not let me past, tomorrow fifty Dargonian orphans will die!"
"I am sorry about your daughter, but if you do not let me past, tomorrow fifty Dargonian orphans will die!"
"I am sorry about your daughter, but if you do not let me past, tomorrow fifty Dargonian orphans will die!"
"I am sorry about your daughter, but if you do not let me past, tomorrow fifty Dargonian orphans will die!"

languages.text: “你女儿的事情我很遗憾，但如果你不让我插个队的话，明天达戈努斯就会有五十个孤儿因此丧命！”
languages.original_text: "I am sorry about your daughter, but if you do not let me past, tomorrow fifty Dargonian orphans will die!"

traits.locale_text: “你女儿的事情我很遗憾，但如果你不让我插个队的话，明天达戈努斯就会有五十个孤儿因此丧命！”

languages.text: «Siento lo de su hija, pero, si no me deja pasar, ¡mañana morirán cincuenta huérfanos dargonianos!».
languages.original_text: "I am sorry about your daughter, but if you do not let me past, tomorrow fifty Dargonian orphans will die!"

traits.locale_text: «Siento lo de su hija, pero, si no me deja pasar, ¡mañana morirán cincuenta huérfanos dargonianos!».

languages.text: 「娘には気の毒だが、{mf|俺|私}を先に行かせなければ、明日にはダルゴナスの孤児50人が死ぬぞ！」
languages.original_text: "I am sorry about your daughter, but if you do not let me past, tomorrow fifty Dargonian orphans will die!"

traits.locale_text: 「娘には気の毒だが、{mf|俺|私}を先に行かせなければ、明日にはダルゴナスの孤児50人が死ぬぞ！」

languages.text: « Je suis {mf|navré|navrée} pour votre fille, mais si vous ne me laissez pas passer, vous aurez la mort de cinquante orphelins dargoniens sur la conscience ! »
languages.original_text: "I am sorry about your daughter, but if you do not let me past, tomorrow fifty Dargonian orphans will die!"

traits.locale_text: « Je suis {mf|navré|navrée} pour votre fille, mais si vous ne me laissez pas passer, vous aurez la mort de cinquante orphelins dargoniens sur la conscience ! »

languages.text: "Das mit Eurer Tochter tut mir leid, aber wenn Ihr mich nicht vorlasst, sterben morgen fünfzig Waisen von Dargonus!"
languages.original_text: "I am sorry about your daughter, but if you do not let me past, tomorrow fifty Dargonian orphans will die!"

traits.locale_text: "Das mit Eurer Tochter tut mir leid, aber wenn Ihr mich nicht vorlasst, sterben morgen fünfzig Waisen von Dargonus!"

languages.text: "Kızın için üzüldüm ama eğer önüne geçmeme izin vermezsen yarın Dargonus'ta elli yetim ölecek!"
languages.original_text: "I am sorry about your daughter, but if you do not let me past, tomorrow fifty Dargonian orphans will die!"

traits.locale_text: "Kızın için üzüldüm ama eğer önüne geçmeme izin vermezsen yarın Dargonus'ta elli yetim ölecek!"
